Package restaurant

Class AbstractMenuItem

java.lang.Object
restaurant.AbstractMenuItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
MenuBundle, MenuLeaf
public abstract class AbstractMenuItem extends Object implements MenuItem
The base class for all menu related classes MenuBundle, MenuLeaf. These classes constitutes a composite pattern with AbstractMenuItem serving as the uniformed interface.
